function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of infectious diseases through shared medical imaging devices","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within healthcare facilities","Mitigation":"Implement strict disinfection protocols between use of imaging devices","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection systems and UV-C sterilization technology","People":"Healthcare staff, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare facility administrators"},{"Description":"Inaccurate temperature monitoring leading to failure to detect potential COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Failure to identify and isolate individuals with high body temperatures, leading to increased transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and maintenance of thermal imaging systems, coupled with manual temperature checks as a backup","Technologies":"Advanced temperature monitoring and calibration systems","People":"Public, healthcare staff","Owner":"Healthcare facility administrators, technology providers"},{"Description":"Potential for cross-contamination through shared use of 5G-powered robots","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading infectious diseases through contact with contaminated robots","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols for robots after each use","Technologies":"Antimicrobial materials, advanced robot cleaning and disinfection systems","People":"Healthcare staff, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, technology providers"}]}
